member.name: D3D12_SAMPLER_FEEDBACK_TIER
member.summary: Defines constants that specify sampler feedback support.

member.name: D3D12_SAMPLER_FEEDBACK_TIER.D3D12_SAMPLER_FEEDBACK_TIER_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Specifies that sampler feedback is not supported. Attempts at calling sampler feedback APIs represent an error.

summary.para: Specifies that sampler feedback is supported to tier 0.9. This indicates the following:
Sampler feedback is supported for samplers with these texture addressing modes:
The Texture2D shader resource view passed in to feedback-writing HLSL methods has these restrictions:

item.description: The MipLevels count must span the full mip count of the resource.

summary.para: The Texture2DArray shader resource view passed in to feedback-writing HLSL methods has these restrictions:

item.description: All the limitations as in Texture2D above, and
The ArraySize field must span the full array element count of the resource.

member.name: D3D12_SAMPLER_FEEDBACK_TIER.D3D12_SAMPLER_FEEDBACK_TIER_1_0
member.summary: Specifies sample feedback is supported to tier 1.0. This indicates that sampler feedback is supported for all texture addressing modes, and feedback-writing methods are supported irrespective of the passed-in shader resource view.
